overview: Check Crow's behaviour when given invalid mustache templates

tests.name: Missing end-tags
tests.desc: Missing end-tags should fail to render ... and not enter infinite loops or other undefined behaviour
tests.expected: COMPILE EXCEPTION: crow::mustache error: open tag has no matching end tag {{# {{/ pair: boolean

tests.name: Unexpected end-tags
tests.desc: Unexpected end-tags should fail to render ... and not enter infinite loops or other undefined behaviour
tests.expected: COMPILE EXCEPTION: crow::mustache error: unexpected closing tag: unexpected
